patthana22.36:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.36:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.36:6.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.36:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaraṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.36:8.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.36:11.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana22.36:12.1: Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana22.36:13.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana22.36:14.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.36:14.2: Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.36:14.3: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.36:15.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare tīṇi … pe … sahajāte nissaye ekavīsa, upanissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.36:16.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
